Package ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.xml

Provides XML serialization support for macro nodes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MacroNodeXMLSerializer A default serializer for reading/writing OpNode to/from XML.
PublishedFieldXMLSerializer A default serializer for reading/writing published InputFields and OutputFields to/from XML.
 

Package ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.xml Description

Provides XML serialization support for macro nodes.
